statements.statement: insert into SWfsPictureManager(PictureName,PictureFileNo, LinkAddress, WebSite, Status, Position, OperatorUserId, PagePosition,DateCreate,SubTitle) values(@PictureName,@PictureFileNo, @LinkAddress, @WebSite, @Status, @Position, @OperatorUserId, @PagePosition,@DateCreate,@SubTitle)
